Pattern Library

content blade component

< back to style guide

PROPS:

  • backgroundColor: can be white, gray, dark, primary or secondary (optional, default is white)
  • title: (optional)
  • image: (optional)
  • altText: (optional, but highly recommended)
  • video: iframe url for vimeo or youtube (optional)
  • alignment: aligns the image/video, can be left or right (optional - the default is left)
  • cta: text for the button (optional)
  • link: url for the button (optional, but required if cta is given)

SLOTS:

  • content: (optional)

Default (white) style:

Title Lorem Ipsum Dolor

Rich text content goes here

Proin non vehicula ante. Morbi ornare, est ac euismod ultricies, ex ante lacinia lacus, in mollis neque velit a lorem. Nulla feugiat sem vel augue varius tincidunt. Quisque ultrices

LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SITE AMET
